posts.cooked: Hello, we are looking to acquire the necessary gears for the L4 ratio. After some consideration, our team is looking to change our ratio to increase speed. We are looking for Double Gear 28T-48T, 16T 3/8" Hex Bore Gear and the 16T 8mm Bore Pinion Gear. If you have them please let me know.
They are on the purchasing page MK4 Swerve Module – Swerve Drive Specialties

link_counts.title: MK4 Swerve Module – Swerve Drive Specialties

posts.name: Kellan Rohde
posts.cooked: I think he is asking for the deferent pinons to change the gearing not to buy new swerves.
Yeah, we have the mk4 modules already however we are looking to change the gearing

posts.name: Kellan Rohde
posts.cooked:
Check this spreadsheet for current lead times. This kit contains the components specific to the type of motor used with the MK4 Swerve Module. Example: Selecting the NEO option will enable you to convert a MK4 swerve module originally...

Price: USD 22.00

but here u go

link_counts.title: Kit, Pinion Gear (MK3/4) – Swerve Drive Specialties

posts.cooked: Actually we have the L2 version of the swerve currently and we are wanting to go to L4. We are using neos and are not going to change the type of motor

posts.name: Kellan Rohde
posts.cooked: Thats fine its a l4 kit that you can buy with you current motors. Neos, Phalcon or even the krakens.
But if we were wanting to change the gear ratio wouldnt we also have to change the double gears and others

We currently have the gear ratio for L2 Neos on Mk4, we have no other gears ,and we are looking to go to L4 Neos on Mk4. I understood that to do this we would have to change the pinion, double gear ,and 3/8ths gear

posts.name: Declan Briggs
posts.cooked:
This Sheet is private

You can refer to the parts list, but yes you need to change all the gears you suggested.

link_counts.title: SDS MK4/4i Parts List - Google Drive

posts.name: Taiga
posts.cooked:
Adding on to this, the pinion and 3/8" gear are in stock elsewhere, but the double gear is the main thing you can’t buy at the moment (i.e. the OP was correct on both asking other teams for them and what you were asking for)

If you find a team willing to give/loan/trade/sell you the double gears, or if you want to get a head start, you can buy the other 2 gears:

16T NEO Pinion:

SDS

WCP-1236 - This is taller than the SDS one, but I think it’s fine as long as you account for it in spacers and such

Andymark

16T 3/8" Hex Gear:

WCP-0732

Andymark - This one is taller than the SDS one, I’m not sure if it’ll fit
